snippet: The rock group OneRepublic wrote a song for a public service advertising campaign by Save the Children, an aid organization working to reduce child mortality.
abstract: Jane L Levere Advertising column notes that rock group OneRepublic has written song for public service advertising campaign by Save the Children, aid organization working to reduce child mortality.
lead_paragraph: The rock group OneRepublic wrote a song for a public service advertising campaign by Save the Children, an aid organization working to reduce child mortality.

headline.seo: Save the Children Uses OneRepublic in Child Mortality Campaign
headline.main: Aid Group Harnesses Heartbeats and a Song to Fight Child Mortality
headline.print_headline: Aid Group Harnesses Heartbeats and a Song To Fight Child Mortality
